Content:
Hello everyone.

I bought a HJC RPHA 11 helmet several months ago. Yesterday, i was trying to install intercom unit. Then i notice a defect on the edge of outer shell. I cannot return the product because the return time is expired though i have never used the helmet. I sent an e-mail to HJC about the problem and waiting for an answer. I'm afraid of the defect get bigger and affect the safety of helmet. It seems like manufacturing defect. I dont have a budget to get a new helmet. What should i
do.
Title: HJC RPHA 11 DEFECT
Author: Dredd
